Class AccountDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.service.AccountDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountDAOI
    public class AccountDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements AccountDAOI
    This is a DAO class to execute CRUD operations with objects of Account class
    Version:
    1.5.
    Author:
    Victor Zenin
    See Also:
    BankDAO, CustomerDAO, PaymentDAO
